list.name: Default
list.comment:
Added functionality to the search class in order to analysis and populate tweets Added tick box to the form to allow the user to decide if they want the search or not. When box is ticked or not the code branches accordingly while ALWAYS doing the live stream.
TO FIX: The text on the form with regards to the warning needs to be put on a new line. The text that should display to show that the search has begun does not show and this should be fixed.

task.summary: Default task
Added in filter for the stream to only get the specified text and in english. Made it so only the date of posting and text is printed.
Added in filter for the stream to only get the specified text and in english. Made it so only the date of posting and text is printed.
added in file creating and writing. Over rights file with each iteration so this needs to be fixed
Made it so the files will not be overwitten. Both classes will write to separate files. Search is refined with more criteria to remove retweets and filter to english only
xml files being pushed so can be converted to maven

Made project into a maven project. Added class for Mongo where it will connect to the mongo db for twitter and return the specified collection. Added in a filter for the Twitter Stream class to remove retweets.

Changed it so stream will write SPLIT HERE as opposed to ',' this will ensure that the split is consistent with the splitting of both date and text. Added functionality to Mongo class to read in the .txt file and to go through it and split each part into its date and text.
Next steps are to fix the split for final term and populate.

Mongo class o Read in text file of tweet data o Specify all variables i.e. database, connection, collection, tweet date, tweet text etc. to be used later. o Stripped date of unneeded characters “]” and “[”. o Build up a document based on data from text file which is to be inserted to the collection. o Add all fields including fields not yet used (sentimentFound and overallSentiment) which are set to “NULL” here. o Insert all this data into the Mongo Db database collection specified.
Twitter stream class added comments changed date format of tweets
Attempts at extracting information needed in order to do comparision of text for sentiment word and polarity
Tried to implement some sentiment matching in the tweet texts against the sentiment collection. Seems to work but isnt updating the db, this should be checked.
Removed unused imports

Changed match sentiment by adding some comments and clears rather than creating new objects. Stream was changed by adding in a clause to try and prevent the error being thrown when end of file is reached.
Fixed issue with regards to collection not being updated. Cause and solution is commented in code Added counters for positive negative and neutral tweets Added comments and removed print lines.
Made new class with all functionality present and variables that are inputs for search phrases and number of tweets to get. Commented out match sentiment class due to the copied/ duplicated code.

Switched code to use Atlas instead of local storage. Upgraded to Java 8 from Java 7. Upgraded mongo db java driver to the latest version. Added in polarity for the twitter_data table. Paramerterised the number of tweets and hashtags to search which are inputted via the console.
Changed searching through tweets so it is more accurate and takes whole words not parts of words.
Made new classes and package to separate work Change functionality so it updates one by one as opposed to bulk at end No updates used only inserts Added in the sentiment words found to the documents

Updated password for connection to cluster Converted tweets to lower case as the word comparison is case sensitive Removed trump from sentiment table as a positive word as when it is converted to lower case it will appear in a lot of trump tweet skewing results.
Created UI and integrated it into code base. Changed input and passing on for database connection class. Altered code to not take input from console but instead use the UI.
Added in balanced polarity Added the same for the all functionality Renamed all functionality class

Made test class for searching along with folder. Made final class for searching with core functionality for analysis and insertion needed. Renamed tweetRetrieval class and refactored to represent this where needed. Added functionality for simplified date for better analysis. Separated functionality for analysising tweet sentiment and insertion into MongoDb collection into its own class. Removed some unneeded code and imports from classes. Minor changes with regards to variable names. Commented out the test search class which can be deleted at a later date.

Added functionality to the search class in order to analysis and populate tweets Added tick box to the form to allow the user to decide if they want the search or not. When box is ticked or not the code branches accordingly while ALWAYS doing the live stream.
TO FIX: The text on the form with regards to the warning needs to be put on a new line. The text that should display to show that the search has begun does not show and this should be fixed.
